resources.string:
"Calculate GPA

" "This app calculates Users GPA based on the input by the User." "When the app is lunched and user is logged in he/she would click 'Calculate G.P.A' button" "which opens the calculator page.
" "The Student is required to select the year(Level) and semester of the result to be calcuated.
" "In the Course section Student are to type the course codes, unit section is for the credit load of the" "course enter in the course section. Then the grade of the course is to be selected.
" "The '+' button is to enable Users add multiple course one after the other by clicking it.
" "If error is made in the entry User can click the 'RESET' button to start Afresh.
" "After the entry, User can now press 'Calculate' button to view their GPA. " "The 'Save' button will show after viewing the GPA, which will enable user save calculated results for later viewing.
" Note: Any result saved twice will alter your account and CGPA and cannot be reversed." "Contact the admin from above for a solution.
" "Viewing Results
" "The Results in the sub-menu allows user view saved results based on the levels and the semester." "The App calculates CGPA based on the result Uploaded using the standard format. " "The CGPA is calculated using all the courses and grades uploaded i.e any mistake in any result will affect your CGPA.
" "If a mistake is seen on a semester, one can delete the semester and Upload the corrected one."
